SEARCH
Package cams.model.appitem

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
cams.model.appitem.Enquiry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable, DisplayableSplitter, Model, Savable
public class Enquiry extends Object implements Model, DisplayableSplitter
This class represents an enquiry made by a user for a camp. An enquiry can be created, viewed, edited, replied to, and deleted. The class also provides methods to access and manipulate attributes of the enquiries.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String enquiryID, String campID, String createdBy, Boolean processed, Boolean deleted, String enquiryMessage, String enquiryReply, Boolean replyViewed)
      Default constructor of this class.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - Id of the enquiry.
      campID - Id of the camp associated with the enquiry.
      createdBy - Id of the user the enquiry is associated with.
      processed - True if the enquiry has been processed, false otherwise.
      deleted - True if the enquiry has been deleted, false otherwise.
      enquiryMessage - The content of the enquiry message.
      enquiryReply - The content of the enquiry reply.
      replyViewed - True if the reply has been viewed, false otherwise.
